        pageSize - -- size of page

        fetch result, EMPageResult

      • fetchPublicChatRoomsFromServer

        public EMCursorResult<EMChatRoom> fetchPublicChatRoomsFromServer(int pageSize,
                                                                 java.lang.String cursor)
                                                          throws com.hyphenate.exceptions.HyphenateException
        Deprecated. use fetchPublicChatRoomsFromServer(int pageNum, int pageSize)
        fetch the chat rooms in page synchronously, when fetch the last page, EMCursorResult.getCursor() return an empty string. this is a time consuming operation
        Parameters:
        pageSize - how many chat room to get
        cursor - cursor position
        Returns:
        fetch result EMCursorResult
        Throws:
        com.hyphenate.exceptions.HyphenateException

      • fetchChatRoomFromServer

        public EMChatRoom fetchChatRoomFromServer(java.lang.String roomId,
                                          boolean fetchMembers)
                                   throws com.hyphenate.exceptions.HyphenateException
        fetch the chat room by room id. If fetchMembers is true, default maximum of fetched member count is 200, to continue fetch members, call fetchChatRoomMembers(String, String, int)
        Parameters:
        roomId - chat room id
        fetchMembers - Whether you need to get chat room members
        Returns:
        EMChatRoom
        Throws:
        com.hyphenate.exceptions.HyphenateException

      • fetchChatRoomMuteList

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Long> fetchChatRoomMuteList(java.lang.String chatRoomId,
                                                                            int pageNum,
                                                                            int pageSize)
                                                                     throws com.hyphenate.exceptions.HyphenateException
        fetch mute list, which contains mute members and mute time, need owner or administrator's authority to access.
        Parameters:
        chatRoomId -
        pageNum -
        pageSize -
        Returns:
        Map.entry.key is username of mute action, Map.entry.value is expired time of banning post action, in milli-seconds
        Throws:
        com.hyphenate.exceptions.HyphenateException
